description: A markup/discount that is defined for a specific set of services that can later be associated with a pricing plan.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FreeTier.description: The possible customizable free tier configurations.

Activated.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

FreeTier.markdownDescription:
The possible customizable free tier configurations.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
Pricing rule name

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_\+=\.\-@]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
Pricing rule description

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

Scope.description: A term used to categorize the granularity of a Pricing Rule.
Scope.markdownDescription:
A term used to categorize the granularity of a Pricing Rule.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: GLOBAL | SERVICE | BILLING_ENTITY | SKU  
Update requires: Replacement

Type.description: One of MARKUP, DISCOUNT or TIERING that describes the behaviour of the pricing rule.
Type.markdownDescription:
One of MARKUP, DISCOUNT or TIERING that describes the behaviour of the pricing rule.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: MARKUP | DISCOUNT | TIERING  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No  
Type: Number  
Update requires: No interruption

Service.description: The service which a pricing rule is applied on

The service which a pricing rule is applied on

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9\.\-]+  
Update requires: Replacement

BillingEntity.description: The seller of services provided by AWS, their affiliates, or third-party providers selling services via AWS Marketplaces. Supported billing entities are AWS, AWS Marketplace, and AISPL.
BillingEntity.markdownDescription:
The seller of services provided by AWS, their affiliates, or third-party providers selling services via AWS Marketplaces. Supported billing entities are AWS, AWS Marketplace, and AISPL.

Required: No  
Type: String

Minimum Length: 1
